nodes.text: Donovia was a planet in the Hali sector of the Expansion Region. It was a mining world of constant rainfall. Many Donovian miners fled the planet to Coruscant when Donovia seceded shortly before the Clone Wars, wishing to remain Galactic Republic citizens.

The technicians known as the Donovian rainmen came from this world. A rainman was any technician who tended the signal towers above the rainy world Donovia. Easily recognized by their enormous rain hoods, the efforts of the rainmen kept the mining traffic to and from Donovia moving smoothly.
